# Link Icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                    | Type                                     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `download` | `download` | Special download attribute to open native browser download dialog if target url points to a downloadable file. | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
| `href`     | `href`     | When providing an url then the component will be rendered as `<a>`.                                            | `string`                                 | `''`        |
| `icon`     | `icon`     | The icon shown.                                                                                                | `string`                                 | `'plus'`    |
| `rel`      | `rel`      | Specifies the relationship of the target object to the link object.                                            | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
| `tabbable` | `tabbable` | To remove the element from tab order                                                                           | `boolean`                                | `true`      |
| `target`   | `target`   | Target attribute where the link should be opened.                                                              | `"blank" \| "parent" \| "self" \| "top"` | `'self'`    |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | Adapts the link color when used on dark background.                                                            | `"dark" \| "light"`                      | `'light'`   |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | The style variant of the link.                                                                                 | `"default" \| "ghost"`                   | `'default'` |


## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [p-icon](../../icon/icon)
